title: [K-12] Synchronous Online Teaching Professional Development: Integrating Reflective Practice and Authentic Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Online Teaching Experience and Basic Competencies in Language Education
context.additional_context: Language education teacher training program conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can apply technical competencies (video conferencing tools, real-time interaction management) in synchronous online classrooms with over 80% accuracy
Through peer feedback and self-reflection, participants produce one or more improved lesson designs that enhance social competencies (learning climate facilitation, cultural sensitivity responses)
Participants analyze real language class cases to derive at least three improvement strategies and implement them in mock lessons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
